Segment.name: SIN
Segment.comment: To report use of tobacco, alcohol, drugs or other substances

Field.name: InformationStatusCode
Field.comment: A code to indicate the status of information

Field.name: ControlledSubstanceTypeCode
Field.comment: Code specifying the type of controlled substance

Field.name: FrequencyCode
Field.comment: Code indicating frequency or type of activities or actions being reported

Field.name: CompositeUnitOfMeasure
Field.comment: To identify a composite unit of measure (See Figures Appendix for examples of use)

SyntaxNote.name: R0203
SyntaxNote.comment: At least one of SIN02 or SIN03 is required.

SyntaxNote.name: P040506
SyntaxNote.comment: If either SIN04, SIN05 or SIN06 are present, then the others are required.
